divs: Sighting DetailsI was talking on my cell phone then I heard static followed by some strange muffled voices and then it went dead I went outside and off in the distance was a large oval shaped object with many different colored lights surrounding it I went back inside to get my girlfriend when we came out it was still there then I looked at her and she looked at me to pretty much make sure of what we saw and when we looked back it was gone
Summary: Large egg like shape many different colored lights
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Henderson
There were no other sightings in Henderson on or around July 13th 2007
